name: LEAD_school
body:
['We
 use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing 
experience on our website, to show you personalized content and targeted
 ads, to analyze our website traffic, and to understand where our 
visitors are coming from.', 'Exposure for all-round growth of your child', 'Exposure for all-round growth of your child', 'Exposure for all-round growth of your child', 'This document is an electronic record in terms of 
Information Technology Act, 2000 and rules made thereunder and as the 
same may be amended from time to time. Being a system generated 
electronic record, it does not require any physical or digital 
signature.', '(hereinafter referred to as the “Website/App”). The Website/App is 
owned by Leadership Boulevard Private Limited, a company formed as per 
the Indian Companies Act, 1956 and having its registered office at 
A-102, Business Square, Andheri Kurla Road, Chakala, Andheri (East) 
Mumbai 400093, Maharashtra.', 'We respect the privacy of our Website/App users (“', '”)
 and the confidentiality of the information provided by you and have 
developed this Privacy Policy to demonstrate our commitment to 
protecting the same. This Privacy Policy describes the type of 
information we collect, purpose, usage, storage and handling of such 
information, and disclosure thereof. We encourage you to read this 
Privacy Policy carefully when (i) using the Website/App from any Android
 mobile, smartphone or tablet, or (ii) accessing any content and/or 
availing any products or services offered on or through the Website/App.
 By using the Website/App, you are accepting the practices described in 
this Privacy Policy.', 'When you use the 
Website/App, we collect Your personal and non-personal information. Such
 personal information helps us to collect information that can directly 
identify you such as name, address, email address, phone number and date
 of birth ("', '"). We also collect your 
non-personal information that does not directly identify you. By using 
the Website/App, you are authorizing us to collect, parse, store, 
process, disclose, disseminate and retain such information as envisaged 
herein. Your personal information shall not be made public without your 
explicit permission.', 'In order to register as a
 user with the Website/App, you may be asked to sign in using your login
 details such as a login name, mobile number and/or password. You may 
also be asked to allow us to collect your location information from the 
device when you use/access the Website/App. In addition, we may collect 
and store any personal information you provide while using the 
Website/App or in some other manner. If you provide any feedback through
 the Website/App, you provide us the content of your feedback, and if 
you contact us for customer service or other inquiry, you provide us 
with the content of that communication.', 'We neither knowingly 
collect any information nor promote the Website/App to any minor under 
the age of 18 (eighteen) years. If you are less than 18 (eighteen) years
 old, we request that you do not submit information to us. If we become 
aware that a minor has registered with us and provided us with personal 
information, we may take steps to terminate such person’s registration 
and delete their account with us.', 'We use various tools and
 technologies, including cookies, to collect personal information and 
non-personal information from the device from which you access the 
Website/App and learn about your activities taking place under your 
account when you use the Website/App. Such non-personal information 
could include your IP address, device ID and type, your browser type and
 language, operating system used by your device, access times, your 
device geographic location and the referring website/app address. We may
 use web beacons and other similar technologies to track your use of the
 Website/App and to deliver or communicate with cookies.', 'How we use the information we collect?', 'We may use information that we collect from you to:', 'deliver and improve the Website/App and our services and manage our business;', 'manage your account and provide you with customer support;', 'communicate with you by email, postal mail, telephone and/or mobile devices about our offerings;', 'develop, display, and 
track content and advertising tailored to your interests on the 
Website/App and other sites, including providing advertisements;', 'enforce or exercise any 
rights in our terms and conditions pertaining to any products/services 
made available through the Website/App;', 'perform functions or services as otherwise described to you at the time of collection; and', 'resolve disputes, 
troubleshoot problems, detect and protect us against any activity not 
expressly authorized under any of our terms and conditions pertaining to
 any products/services made available through the Website/App.', 'With whom we share your information?', 'When you register as a 
user of the Website/App, your profile details will be accessible and 
viewable by our schools/our partner schools and us.', 'We do not share your 
personal information with others except with our schools/our partner 
schools and as indicated in this Privacy Policy.', "We may also disclose 
your and your child’s personal information (i) for complying with 
applicable laws, requests or orders from law enforcement agencies, 
appropriate authorities (such as without limitation, child protection 
agencies, court officials, expert professional investigative agencies 
and the like) or for any legal process; (ii) for enforcing any of the 
terms and conditions pertaining to any products/services made available 
through the Website/App; (iii) for protecting or defending ours, our 
school’s/our partner school’s or any third party's rights or property; 
(iv) for supporting any fraud/ legal investigation/ verification checks;
 or (v) in connection with a corporate transaction, including but not 
limited to sale of our business, merger, consolidation, or in the 
unlikely event of bankruptcy.", 'We may use and share 
your non-personal information we collect under any of the above 
circumstances, including with third parties for undertaking analysis 
thereof. We also may share aggregated, non-personal information, or 
personal information in hashed, non-human readable form, with third 
parties, including advisors, advertisers and investors, for the purpose 
of conducting general business analysis or other business purposes.', 'How can you access or control your information?', "If you have an account 
with us, you can review and update your personal information by opening 
and editing your profile details. In addition, we give you the control 
to opt out of having your personal information shared, via the 
Website/App settings. If you logout from your account or uninstall the 
Website/App, we may retain certain information associated with your 
account for analytical purposes and recordkeeping purposes or as 
required by law, as well as to prevent fraud, enforce any of our terms 
and conditions pertaining to any products/services made available 
through the Website/App, take actions we deem necessary to protect the 
integrity of the Website/App or other Website/App users, or take other 
actions otherwise permitted by law. In addition, if certain information 
has already been provided to third parties as described in this Privacy 
Policy, retention of that information will be subject to those third 
parties' policies.", 'You can choose not to 
provide us with certain information; however this may result in you 
being unable to use certain features of the Website/App. The Website/App
 may also deliver notifications to your email or mobile device. You can 
disable these notifications by deleting the Website/App or by changing 
the Website/App settings.', 'You are solely liable and responsible for any information you provide and/or share using the Website/App.', 'How do we protect your personal information?', 'We adopt reasonable security 
practices and procedures to help safeguard the personal information you 
provide on the Website/App from unauthorized access. However, you 
acknowledge that no Internet transmission or system or server can be 
100% secure. Therefore, although we take all reasonable steps to secure 
your personal information, we do not promise or guarantee the same, and 
you should not expect that your personal information, or other 
communications while using the Website/App will always remain secure and
 safeguarded by us. You should always exercise caution while providing, 
sharing or disclosing your personal information using the Website/App.', 'We may occasionally update this 
Privacy Policy. When we post changes to this Privacy Policy, we will 
revise the "last updated" date. We recommend that you check the 
Website/App from time to time to keep yourself updated of any changes in
 this Privacy Policy or any of our other service related terms and 
policies.', 'Please contact our Grievance Officer, Sanjay Raghav on', 'for any questions or comments regarding this Privacy Policy.', '401/501, 4th Floor, B Wing, Business Square, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai 400 093', 'I agree to receive communications by Whatsapp', 'Exposure for all-round growth of your child', 'Your school with international standard education', '© Copyright Leadership Boulevard Private Limited 2021. All rights reserved.', 'Give Your School The Lead Advantage', 'Bosnia and Herzegovina (Босна и Херцеговина)', 'Congo (DRC) (Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo)', 'North Korea (조선 민주주의 인민 공화국)', 'São Tomé and Príncipe (São Tomé e Príncipe)', 'United Arab Emirates (‫الإمارات العربية المتحدة‬‎)', 'I agree to receive communications by Whatsapp', 'GIVE YOUR CHILD THE LEAD ADVANTAGE', 'Bosnia and Herzegovina (Босна и Херцеговина)', 'Congo (DRC) (Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo)', 'North Korea (조선 민주주의 인민 공화국)', 'São Tomé and Príncipe (São Tomé e Príncipe)', 'United Arab Emirates (‫الإمارات العربية المتحدة‬‎)', 'Already studying in LEAD powered school', 'Looking for transfer in different school', 'I agree to receive communications by Whatsapp', 'Give Your School The Lead Advantage', 'Bosnia and Herzegovina (Босна и Херцеговина)', 'Congo (DRC) (Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo)', 'North Korea (조선 민주주의 인민 공화국)', 'São Tomé and Príncipe (São Tomé e Príncipe)', 'United Arab Emirates (‫الإمارات العربية المتحدة‬‎)', 'I agree to receive communications by Whatsapp', "Here's a handy guide for you", 'Bosnia and Herzegovina (Босна и Херцеговина)', 'Congo (DRC) (Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo)', 'North Korea (조선 민주주의 인민 공화국)', 'São Tomé and Príncipe (São Tomé e Príncipe)', 'United Arab Emirates (‫الإمارات العربية المتحدة‬‎)', 'I agree to receive communications by Whatsapp', 'ePrivacy and GPDR Cookie Consent by', 'If you use your real email address here, Facebook may be able to track you. Click to learn more.', 'Allow Facebook to track you here?', 'This
 site can share your email address with Facebook, which allows Facebook 
to track you. Use a service like Firefox Relay to hide your real email 
address.', 'If you use your real email address here, Facebook may be able to track you. Click to learn more.', 'Allow Facebook to track you here?', 'This
 site can share your email address with Facebook, which allows Facebook 
to track you. Use a service like Firefox Relay to hide your real email 
address.']

name: gomechanic
body:
['*Custom Services might have pickup drop and inspection charges', 'We, TargetOne Innovations, are registered at 3rd Floor, Landmark Tower, Moti Vihar, Ashok Marg, South City 1, Sector 41, Gurugram, Haryana 122001
                    , here in after referred to as GoMechanic. At GoMechanic , we respect your privacy & value your
                    trust. This Privacy Policy provides you with details about the manner in which your data is collected,
                    stored & used by us. You are advised to read this policy carefully. After going through below details,
                    you expressly give us consent to use & disclose your personal information in accordance with this Privacy
                    Policy. If you do not agree to the terms of the policy, please do not use or access GoMechanic website and mobile
                    applications. Note: Request you to kindly review the policy periodically since it can change
                    without any prior notification. The privacy policy shall apply to both GoMechanic website and mobile applications.', 'In terms of the Information Technology (Intermediaries Guidelines) Rules, 2011 and the Information Technology 
                (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011, any grievance or complaint may be 
                intimated to Saurabh Bhardwaj, Grievance Officer, who may be reached at Basement, Landmark Tower, Moti Vihar, Ashok Marg, South City I, Sector 41,
